title: New: Jamie Isaac – Her Exodus
body:
Having dominated the pages of **CitR** towards the latter half of 2011, teenage bedroom producer **Jamie Isaac** drops his first new material of 2012, with the wonderfully dubstep inspired _Her Exodus_.

Playing on his own looped vocals, and a repetitive minimal beat, it’s beauty is contained within it’s pure simplicity, rather than his previously exploited lyrical prowess. Having now signed and with an EP release on the way, as predicted by yours truly, 2012 is set to be an impressive year for **Isaac**.
